title: I have problem with username assistences
body: I can remember my username of account, so when i try to find it on my email and i went to the official site and type my email on the ''Recover Username'' box and i pressed ''Submit'' it was loading too long, and after loading it says ''An error has occurred. Please try again later'' and when i refresh and try again it say it again, i waited for lile 10 minutes od 20 and i tryed again and the same problem, and its taking too long dude ... can u tell is that any other way to find out my username because i have this problem like a 2 or 3 mounts, and i have no idea how to fix it. tnx in advice. LACE UP!

replies.body: That recovery option is about the only way to recover your username. If you're having problems getting it to work though, you can go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and choose the account recovery option. You'll need to go through the verification process, but after that, we should be able to help you out in the ticket.
